title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
created_time: January 25, 2023, 04:27:06 PMLast edit: January 26, 2023, 11:56:22 AM by KupaCrypto
content: Every man is meant to have self discipline, because when you have self discipline as a man you will  work towards your goals and definitely achieve them, disciplining yourself as a man also comes down to taking  decisions better for you without the influence of a third-party and then not easy being influenced by things around you.Relating it to business discipline as a business man involves setting business standards and adhering to them,

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: If you work on self-discipline, but don't let it become such a driving force that it overcomes your best thinking, you can focus on memory. Cellular memory is what lets people grow old. Their cells forget how to remember how to operate, thereby becoming old and worn out.Take time to discipline yourself to focus on getting your cells to remember to live. You just might live longer and healthier that way.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: To be disciplined is a very wide spectrum. As a man you should aim to work hard, protect & provide for your family. You should be honest, kind & a good person. You should always aim to be the best version of yourself possible, whatever that is.Set yourself achievable goals & always look to improve in everything you do. The human body & mind can achieve great things if we push ourselves.

comments.author: Dariona
comments.body: The ability to set a goal is to take one step towards achieving it. This is a very important school. Planning and self-discipline help me. Sports are very important to be able to become disciplined! I think so.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Self-discipline begins when you are a toddler and goes through human development. Understanding the importance of self-discipline is an important aspect in anything. We can develop a skill as an adult, to understand our weakness and strengthen, the temptations of anything bad can be removed. Especially our perception about willpower can hold such a great possession. Knowing that if we fail in something that a backup plan can be made and help you move forward with goals. This can be used for kicking a bad habit or wrapping up a project that needs to be submitted to your boss.

comments.author: mu_enrico
comments.body: The essence of discipline is to develop good habits. If you have enough good habits, you'll stand out from others and will be more productive. Imagine if you are used to doing workouts 2 times a week, eating healthy foods, waking up early, reading a lot, etc. Your body and mind will be at top capacity every time.So if the question is "how?" Then one step at a time, one good habit at a time should be good. Once you develop one good habit, move to another activity that will develop another good habit.
